# SecureStringUtility.FromString method

Creates a [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md) from a normal String.

```csharp
public static SecureString FromString(string input)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| input | The string to convert to a [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md). |

## Return Value

A [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md) containing the text in *input*.
